data.description:
Practice and perfect all-important soft skills in Bodyswaps - an award winning psychologically safe VR tool that combines behavioural science and AI data with realistic workplace scenarios. 

Experience role play like never before to build skills like:
 - Active listening
 - Clear communication
 - Gender inclusion
 - Understanding and resolving conflict
 - Giving feedback
 - Career mindset development
 - Job interview skills
 - And more...
  
Through our 15 minute simulations, you will… 

Observe, analyse and identify best (and worst) practice. 

Explore your impact on others with simulated conversations where the outcomes reflect your choices. 

Deliver an intervention in your own words, then Bodyswap to see your performance from another person’s perspective. 

And fast-track personal development with truly personalised feedback and guidance from AI-enabled behavioural and semantic analyses.

changelog.change_log: Two New Learning Modules: TeamSTEPPS® Simulator & Navigating Angry Conversations US edition and various cosmetic and stability fixes

Two New Learning Modules: TeamSTEPPS® Simulator & Navigating Angry Conversations US edition
Various cosmetic and stability fixes

Library Addition - Growth Mindset and Resilience & Talented Teamwork

Demo module updated to include Navigating Angry Conversations taster
Demo module now has captions & minor bug fixes
bug fixes
Two New Learning Modules: Communicating in a Person-Centred Way: Getting to know each individual & Communicating in a Person-Centred Way: Acting with empathy

* New Learning Module: Workplace Communication (50 minutes) - helping young people build the skills they need to prepare for the world of work. Topics include: active listening, non-verbal signals, communicating with clarity and confidence and structuring arguments.
* Job Interview Simulator now supports AI generated customisable questions. Choose the job role you want to be interviewed for and receive personalised feedback and hints.
* German language support for main menu and German captions added for the Let’s Talk About Race series.
minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

* Initial release of three new modules on Negotiation skills.
* Minor bug fixes and improvements
Minor bug fixes

Public Speaking update.
App improvements.
Bug fixes.

- Reduced app size
 - Conversation bug fix
 - Avatar selection bug fix
 - Better loading times of modules
 - Bug fixes
Customer Experience Training initial release
Initial release of Navigating Angry Conversations module
